# WEEK 10: Predictive Text

**Write 250 words each day.**  
**Due: Sunday, June 15, 2025 at 11:59 PM**

## Day 1 — Monday, June 02, 2025

Predictive Text — Imagine your future cognition in 20 years. How will your brain be shaped by machines or new interfaces?

## Day 2 — Tuesday, June 03, 2025

Neuro-Legacy — What thought, insight, or neural pattern would you want to pass down to future generations?

## Day 3 — Wednesday, June 04, 2025

Final Debug — Write about a lingering contradiction in your thinking. Where might it come from, and what needs adjusting?

## Day 4 — Thursday, June 05, 2025

System Integration — What’s one course idea that now feels deeply personal to you? Trace the arc of how it became yours.

## Day 5 — Friday, June 06, 2025

Meta Mode — How has your cognitive process evolved this quarter? Show it narratively through a moment of transformation.
